wiki.content:
"Sunrise" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Club Play Chart in the Summer of 2003.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Sunrise" peaked at #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Club Play Chart in the Summer of 2003.

The song contains samples of Hall & Oates's 1981 smash hit "I Can't Go for That (No Can Do)"

I can go for this! Seriously, a great song that samples another great song. Two classics in one listen.
